website_summaries.verdict: This quartz watch has noticeable heft and a strong attitude, with an attractive stainless design and gleaming crystal over black dial back that together make a powerful statement.
pros: Attractive design with dark blue and black dial, scratch-resistant crystal that reflects light in a sparkling manner
Large dial for a more masculine feel
Neutral style encourages wear with everything from business suits to casual days
cons: Some users report problems with the second hand and calibration, even after reset, with the second hand resetting to the :59 second mark instead of :00
Date dial extremely small and can be hard to read

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the marketing photos; blue is actually purple
customer_reviews.text: The marketing photos of this watch look beautiful. On Amazon and Victorinox's own website, the blue version looks amazing. Reality is far different. The face color could best be described as bright violet/purple rather than the blue you see in the photos online and the bezel is *much* darker than the face. And this thing reflects light like crazy. Shiny everything. In a normal office, it's actually hard to read the face because it seems like everything on the face reflects light.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Handed Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of this watch. It's definitely a little on the heavy side, which I like in a watch. Time keeping accuracy is perfect so far, and I do like the look. It's a sort of Rolex look, but different. I've gotten many complements on it since I started to wear it. All in all I'm pleased with this purchase. May 28, 2020: Someone asked for a picture of the back of the watch. Here is that picture. I've had the watch 5 years now and I love it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lookingwatch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch, looks even better in person i think. There is a good weight to this watch and it is made very well. It was a birthday gift for my boyfriend and his first really nice watch and it was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley menke

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but one with flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and solidly built watch and band. However, the blue dial and bezel is considerably darker than the posted pictures...in fact the bezel looks black and the face only looks blue under certain lighting conditions. As noted in other reviews the calendar date window is tiny and difficult to read and the luminous pieces are scarce and fade within 15 - 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: allan g griffith

customer_reviews.title: I love the green dial and overall appearance of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the green dial and overall appearance of this watch. It's a fairly heavy watch, but it's not a gigantic watch that looks like I'm wearing a kitchen wall clock. I can't comment about using all the functions other than saying it's easy to set time and date. It's doubtful that I'll use all of those little dials, but they look nice. I have no complaints with the watch or band. I think it's a beautiful watch and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turner

customer_reviews.title: the watch looks absolutely fantastic. blue dials looks great and reflects lights very ...
customer_reviews.text: As someone mentioned in other comments there is a misalignment with the chronograph marker, if you reset it, it will stop a little bit to the left ( in the comment submitted by someone else, the marker stops to the right) which seem to be some build/manufacturer error present in this model which is a shame! That said, the watch looks absolutely fantastic. blue dials looks great and reflects lights very neatly.basically it looks good enough that i didn't bother sending it back for the slight marker misalignment. Its also got a nice weight, you do feel like you are actually wearing something precious and not just cheap light watch.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch---awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I have ever owned. It has the feel and great look of a Rolex without the huge price. I had to get one link removed from the band for a perfect fit, but that was easy. I went to a jeweler at the mall who charged me $10 and did a professional job with it in just few minutes. The price of the watch was heavily discounted by Amazon, so it was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: TexasX

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic time piece. I really love it! I set the time two months ago roughly, and it is only 5 seconds slow after two months! Incredible! The luminous dials are quite decent and can get very bright if coming intonation dark place from direct sun. The crown wheel is very nice and crisp. I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Foster

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect! ALMOST
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch, very nice done and really good product for the price the only problem mine has, the seconds for chronograph doesnt work, after 30 minutes the chronograph hour goes to half and then after another 30 minutes goes right on one hour mark, WHY THE SECONDS DOESNT WORKKKKKKKKKKKKKK???????? BESIDES ALL THIS I JUST LOVE IT, REALLY, I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Gor Petrosyan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Very heavy. Had to have 3 links removed at a jeweler so it would fit but really love it. Great price and about 1/2 the price for the same style/model that I found online.
customer_reviews.author: j.mims

customer_reviews.title: This watch is exotic!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is well made. The craftsmanship challenges watches 2-3 times more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mackzo

customer_reviews.title: About right for $
customer_reviews.text: Just got the watch today. It's nice. Good weight. To me there is something slightly cheap about the bezel and mine is NOT unidirectional like the description claimed it would be. Plus the date is so small it's nearly impossible to read just like the tachometer print. The watch face may be a little busy for me unlike the more classic / clean submariner style. I like the brushed steel band. Overall it seems about right for the price - mid 300s. May return it, not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Webb

customer_reviews.title: Nice timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Substantial and striking. Haven't had it long enough to speak for performance, but I look forward to a long time of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt recomend
customer_reviews.text: decent looking watch but the clasp broke within 2 weeks of my new husband wearing it. Would keep looking; there are better quality watches for the price and the seller will not honor a return.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great looking watch. I view Victorinox in the same category as Seiko. High-quality, great value, Good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch. Very solidly built, great looking face. Can be quite heavy if you're not used to a big steel chronograph. Was delivered in manufacturers box compete with warrant card and all manuals. Fantastic watch for the price. Looks better in person than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Knepper

customer_reviews.title: great quality. If you are looking for an oustanding ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy watch, great quality. If you are looking for an oustanding green dial watch this is the probably the among best you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Fly around the world

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox Swiss Army are excellents watches, and this is Victorinox, very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at various Victorinox watches for a while and finally decided on this one. Couldn't be happier... The watch is really sturdy and has a great blend of the silver and blues, which makes it really attractive. Was delivered promptly with the time set.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch for the price! This is a superb looking timepiece that also feels substantial on the wrist. It goes well with pretty much anything. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: blue and beautiful. It was also very easy to pop a ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the watch yesterday and was very impressed by how it looked in person. It’s big, blue and beautiful. It was also very easy to pop a couple links out by myself. Love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cost benefit, Swiss machinery and deliver was earlier than estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the design and material of this watch. it looks really alike Rolex
customer_reviews.author: Pete C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch! It has a very high quality feel and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alsland

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered scratched, damaged band, scratches everywhere (band, clipping mechanism and glass). I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Federico JMC

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing watch. You can wear it on anything (Business
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing watch. You can wear it on anything (Business, Casual, Party). Also its lot cheaper on Amazon compare to Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: KRP

customer_reviews.title: Still Wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: Still Wearing it. and after this many years still working great.
customer_reviews.author: E. I.

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox Men's 241693 Maverick
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality watch that looks great and performs well at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: The dial is really pretty - looks like rolex but the silver strap is doesn't look good at all. They need to fix it - so that more people will get attracted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality watch. It looks great and feels comfortable. Its heavy and the steel parts may a get scratched easily.
customer_reviews.author: draza

customer_reviews.title: Qualituly
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good quality but it is heavy and has a large case profile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Time Piece
customer_reviews.text: What a great watch! It has small adjustments so it fits perfectly. The pictures don't do it justice! Only time will tell if it holds up, but with a 3 year warranty, I don't know how you could go wrong! Update 4/14/16 Spent the week in the ocean no pools with this watch. It stood up to the task great and I received many compliments from Rolex enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Macatticus

customer_reviews.title: Winner Winner
customer_reviews.text: Was my second and now I'm going for my third...... i happened to buy this at a good time and the price on them even went up..... Yipppeeeee
customer_reviews.author: Austin Dumont

customer_reviews.title: This watch is solid, accurate, and eye catching ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is solid, accurate, and eye catching. It was a gift for my boyfriend and he wears it proudly on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch. It is heavy and sober. Nice golden color
customer_reviews.author: Ratan Udassi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly what I was looking for in a watch
customer_reviews.author: ana perichon

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Live the size and the way it looks. Good value!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous in person. Quality Swiss watch that does not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the chronograph looks like a cheap watch the rest of it is fine
customer_reviews.author: SERGIO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch, looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, looks and feels great. The box presentation is great as well...... For the price these are hard to beat!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch and is a perfect addition to my collection. Very nice every day watch.

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome worth every penny. I like it so much Iam buying another one. It is such a quality watch.

customer_reviews.title: Great value 2nd one I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Great value 2nd one I have owned, if this one last 22 years like the first I will have no complaints

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very comfortable to wear and looks great! It has been a great addition to my collection.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. The actual face of the watch is much darker than the picture suggests. Just an FYI.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and am thrilled with the quality, the feel and professional appearance!

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Army watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. This is my third Swiss Army and I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money!
customer_reviews.text: The Maverick watches are great value for the money. I was so impressed with this watch I ordered two more in the Maverick line up. I have already received compliments on this watch. I especially like the "chunky" solid feel of the watch. Highly recommend buying these watches.

customer_reviews.title: Greatwatch - looks better in person

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks amazing. It has some weight to it
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesnt do it justice. The watch looks amazing. It has some weight to it, giving it that more premium feeling to it, like it feels solid.

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Men's Maverick Chronograph Watch
product_meta.description:
Maverick Chronograph Watch. This 43mm men's chronograph watch transitions from day to night, and is watch is forever timeless. High-quality materials make this watch a lasting accessory for years to come. 

FEATURES 

Classic Look. Leather strap or stainless steel bracelet. Accessorize with confidence. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Chronograph and tachymeter functions. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.72 x 4.72 x 4.72 inches; 1.7 Pounds
 * Item model number :241786
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :August 1, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Victorinox
 * ASIN :B071LJJFPC

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #275,539 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #2028 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #1235 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #78897 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars143 ratings Maverick Chronograph Watch. This 43mm men's chronograph watch transitions from day to night, and is watch is forever timeless. High-quality materials make this watch a lasting accessory for years to come. 

FEATURES 

Classic Look. Leather strap or stainless steel bracelet. Accessorize with confidence. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Chronograph and tachymeter functions. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.
feature_bullets: REFINED LEATHER. Strong, substantial leather with a fine-grain texture. A refined strap with a distinguished look, the leather offsets the modern, sleek look of the technical face.

CHRONOGRAPH AND TACHYMETER. This Swiss Made watch features a unidirectional rotating bezel, a count-up scale as well as chronograph and tachymeter functions. Case is crafted from high-grade hypoallergenic stainless steel. Analog quartz movement.

BLACK EDITION. Strong PVD coating offers a sleek, sophisticated look and a hardened protective coating. The Matte Black finish gives the watch a modern look and helps protect against scrapes and scratches.
WATCH DETAILS. 43mm. Screw-in caseback, scratch-resistant, triple-coated anti-reflective sapphire crystal, date, tachymeter and chronograph. Water resistance: 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.

TRUSTED QUALITY. Watches purchased from authorized retailers eligible for a 3-year limited warranty. Excludes battery life, normal wear and tear, improper handling, damage resulting from abuse, misuse, accidents or unauthorized repair.
